title: YoungWild
overview: Struggling in school and told he had learning and attention difficulties, young Lincoln Tapp finds a natural alternative to medication - literally. With bow and arrow in hand, he found his focus and is proving he has the ability they told him he didn't. Now his sights are set on becoming the youngest hunter to complete the Super Slam of North American Big Game and reaching out to kids across the nation who struggle with not fitting the traditional mold.
